subject: URGENT: 51+ Dead in Iran Protests - UK Media Coverage Needed
body:
Dear {{recipientName}},

I am writing to you from {{senderCountry}} regarding the humanitarian crisis unfolding in Iran since 28 December 2025.

The situation is critical:
• Over 51 protesters killed by security forces
• More than 2,270 people detained
• Complete nationwide internet blackout
• Reports of live ammunition being used against peaceful demonstrators

As a member of the Iranian diaspora in the UK, I urge you to cover this crisis. The Iranian people are risking everything for their freedom, and international media attention can help protect them.

BBC Persian and other UK outlets have historically played a vital role in informing the Iranian public. Your coverage matters.

Thank you for your consideration.

Kind regards,
A concerned reader

variations.body:
Dear {{recipientName}},

I hope this finds you well. I am reaching out from {{senderCountry}} about the escalating violence in Iran.

Since late December 2025:
• At least 51 people have been killed in protests
• 2,270+ individuals detained by authorities
• Total internet shutdown implemented nationwide
• Security forces using lethal force on civilians

UK media has always been a beacon for truth in Iran. Your reporting reaches millions and can bring vital international attention to this crisis.

I respectfully ask that you investigate and report on these events.

With appreciation,
A member of the Iranian community in the UK

variations.subject: Breaking: Mass Protests in Iran - 51+ Dead, Internet Blackout
variations.body:
Dear {{recipientName}},

I am contacting you regarding the ongoing protests in Iran that began on 28 December 2025.

Current verified facts:
• 51+ protesters killed by security forces
• Over 2,270 detained, including students and journalists
• Nationwide internet blackout in effect
• Documented use of live fire against unarmed crowds

Writing from {{senderCountry}}, I watch helplessly as events unfold. Your coverage could shine a light on the truth and potentially save lives.

Please consider reporting on this humanitarian crisis.

Best regards,
A concerned citizen
